dependencies.description:
COLLIER: A Complex One-Loop LIbrary with Extended Regularizations for
the numerical evaluation of one-loop scalar and tensor integrals
appearing in perturbative relativistic quantum field theory.
dependencies.name: collier

dependencies.description:
A high energy physics software package for jet finding in pp and e+e-
collisions.
dependencies.name: fastjet

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description: Additional libraries for GoSam MC generator
dependencies.name: gosam-contrib

dependencies.description:
LHAPDF is a general purpose C++ interpolator, used for evaluating PDFs
from discretised data files.
dependencies.name: lhapdf

dependencies.description: Libtirpc is a port of Suns Transport-Independent RPC library to Linux.
dependencies.name: libtirpc

dependencies.description: A tool to derive theoretical systematic uncertainties
dependencies.name: syscalc

dependent_to.description: Herwig is a multi-purpose particle physics event generator.
dependent_to.name: herwig3

dependent_to.description:
The Pythia program is a standard tool for the generation of events in
high-energy collisions, comprising a coherent set of physics models for
the evolution from a few-body hard process to a complex multiparticle
final state.
dependent_to.name: pythia8

description:
MadGraph5_aMC@NLO is a framework that aims at providing all the elements
necessary for SM and BSM phenomenology, such as the computations of
cross sections, the generation of hard events and their matching with
event generators, and the use of a variety of tools relevant to event
manipulation and analysis.
name: madgraph5amc

variants.description: Apply changes requested by the ATLAS experimenent on LHC
variants.name: atlas

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
